channel.title: S3 on RBAC ATLAS
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: crossplane
item.description:
Description

Crossplane is an open source Kubernetes add-on that enables platform teams to assemble infrastructure from multiple vendors, and expose higher level self-service APIs for application teams to consume.

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
rbac-manager default âŒ â€” 16 1 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

item.title: minio
item.description:
Description

MinIO(R) is an object storage server, compatible with Amazon S3 cloud storage service, mainly used for storing unstructured data (such as photos, videos, log files, etc.).

  • https://github.com/bitnami/charts/tree/main/bitnami/minio

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
minio default âŒ minio 0 2 â€”

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ğŸ¤– minio

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ Â |Â  Secrets: minio

ğŸ”‘ Permissions (0)

No explicit RBAC bindings.

item.title: minio-operator
item.description:
Description

A Helm chart for MinIO Operator

  • https://github.com/minio/operator

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
console-sa default âŒ â€” 30 1 Critical
minio-operator default âŒ â€” 21 1 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ğŸ¤– console-sa

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ğŸ”‘ Permissions (30)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags

ClusterRole console-sa-role core/secrets create Â· deletecollection Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical ClusterWideSecretAccess CredentialAccess DataExposure InformationDisclosure SecretAccess
